name: Saborstudio
overview:
aborstudio is a Costa Rican-based startup studio, specialized in mobile game development. The initial product for the studio is called Pota-Toss and is set to be released in 2012.

Saborstudio was selected for the Summer 2012 DreamIT Ventures program in New York.

The game Pota-Toss was launched in group-founding website Kickstarter and reached it’s goal in a matter of 5 days, out of 45 planned. It has been reviewed as “The Next Angry Birds” by editors techcrunch.com and toucharcade.com

milestones.description: Accepted to Summer 2012 DreamIT Ventures Program in NYC.
milestones.source_description: We're in! Selected for the DreamIT Ventures program in New York!
